name: Zombie Fighters
description:
Thanks for Checking out my Gamejam submission! This is the third game i have made and my first attempt at a 2D art style.

Kill some zombies to earn coins and become more powerful

Controls
W,A,S,D to move,  escape to get to the pause menu and shop.
You can also press the page up and page down keys to change the volume.
Your weapons will attack automatically

Installation Guide
1) Download File
2) Right click and unzip file
3) Double click Zombie Fighters application
